command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE admin_activity_log;
stdout:
Table	Create Table
admin_activity_log	CREATE TABLE `admin_activity_log` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `action` enum('create','update','delete','publish','unpublish','archive','login','logout','export','import','settings_change','role_change') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `entityType` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `entityId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `entityTitle` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `details` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `ipAddress` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
